1.content:
Tom roamed the aisles of his local book store. He barely reads, he doesn't even know why he's here. Someone once told him reading a book he was interested in before bed might help him fall asleep easier. Rubbing his eyes he continues through to the fiction shelves, hoping something will catch his eye.

Workers prowl the aisles, keeping an eye on him as closing time is approaching, they're trying to pick the most strategic moment to tell Tom to get lost no doubt. A cute girl who looks around 25 decides to take the fall for the staff.

"Excuse me sir, we're closing in 15 minutes. Can I give you a hand with anything?" Well rehearsed yet dull delivery, however she stepped up on behalf of her team so this generic 'get lost so I can go home' gets a solid 7 out of 10 from Tom. Her green eyes watch expectantly from behind a curtain of black hair which she brushes away from her face.

"I think you can" Tom replies with a hint of smile, trying to show he's slightly less dead inside. "I'm looking for something chunky, something I can read for months but something I look forward to reading every night"

"Well we have some old books out the back we might be able to discount for you."

"That would be fantastic thank you"

Following the worker into the back room, she wasn't lying but she isn't exactly hiding another, better book shop back here. There is a grand total of 3 worn out books. Their spines do catch your eye though, strange symbols draw your eye along as you try to decipher which language they're from. Unable to read the titles, Tom has to judge a book from the cover.

The least scuffed of the books catches his eye first. Purple and pink with slightly raised writing, written in a white colour. It looks like a fairly significant read but looks a bit plain.

The second is a book which is a little more scuffed but very eye catching. A moderate shade of brown makes the backdrop of the cover with the symbols written across in a bold, fiery red colour. Blue borders surround the cover in a solid border.

The final book is incredibly scuffed, it looks like it's spent it's life loose in a coal train engine compartment. The corners are blunted and the pages show through little tears. The cover is a light shade of smoke grey with imposing black writing over the cover. Red patches reminiscent of blood adorn the cover too in a chaotic pattern.

A faint cough brings Tom back to the present, he checks his watch and seeing that there is 5 minutes left he makes his choice.
1.title: Book Sale

11.content:
Tom selects the Least scuffed but plain book, then shuffled to the checkout by the staff.

"That comes to a total of $7 please sir" the cute worker says with a relieved smile, happy to make it out of work.

Handing over the money, they send him out the door with his new purchase. Driving in the city is always notorious so Tom never felt the need to invest in a car, instead relying on public transport. Luckily tonight he's near to his apartment. Working as a legal firm receptionist isn't the most glorious job but they pay above average. A lucky find led to renting a comfortable little apartment about 20 minutes away from the CBD. Nightlife isn't far away and on Friday nights it's easy to hear the laughter and mindless chatter coming from below.

Dropping his bag onto a chair, undoing his tie, and trying to relax as his thoughts dwelled on the odd realization that the book might have been a bad impulse buy. Shrugging, he walks over towards a bottle of wine, a gift from a co-worker, and decides to pour himself a glass, wanting to unwind after the day he'd had and the peculiarity of that urge to buy a book.

Absently opening the book to see if it had an index or anything of note in the front pages, while sipping at his drink, Tom gets confused as he thinks he sees something on a couple of pages. Drawn to put the glass down, and placing both hands on the book while leaning down to see what had caught his attention, Tom suddenly hisses, a burning feeling on the palm of his hand!

"You know, when they trapped me in the book, you think they would have made a proper instruction page instead of silly bindings and no real explanation what you did would entail, eh?" Comes the voice of an amused female, her tone both seductive, smokey, and in an apartment that should only have one occupant!?

Shocked, Tom quickly spins in place, gasping at the sight of the voice's owner, a stunning yet oddly simply dressed woman who hadn't been there before. With brown hair flowing down her back in a french braid down to mid back, a simple black dress, that showed just enough cleavage and her figure to be both attention grabbing, yet not enough to give off the 'slut' vibe. Her arms were crossed under her generous sized bust, lifting them up slightly, she had an amused smirk on her face....her pink eyes being the only true oddity aside from her sudden appearance.

"Who the hell are you, and how did you get in here?" Tom asks, both confused and slightly aroused at the very sight of her.

He slightly scowls when he sees her giggle, her breasts jiggling being the only thing lessening it from anger and fear to just mild annoyance. Chuckling soon follows before she holds up a hand in the universal gesture of 'wait a moment'.

"Sorry, it's just, the last time i was out and about, the person that stumbled across me didn't bother to think beyond 'ooh, sex!' - it's a novel experience, then again, it's been a while from what i can tell," The woman says, moving over to the nearby couch, sitting down on it, crossing her legs, showing them to be long, milky, and sexy.

Tom's gaze is drawn to said legs, traveling up them slightly to the shadowed and hidden depths beneath the dress before shaking his head, focusing on the woman's face, which seemed to be both plain, yet beautiful.

"You didn't answer my questions?" He points out, earning a nod from the woman, who gestures for Tom to sit down.

"Well Master," "What?" "Master, if you keep interrupting i can't explain anything~" The woman teases, getting a glare from Tom, who holds his tongue to let her get on with explaining.

"A long time ago magic was a common enough thing that supernatural beings were still out and about, and some were terrorizing the humans of the lands. Sadly, when one being causes trouble, all get tarred with the same brush, and that is no different with what happened to me." The woman says, looking somewhat wistful for a moment before giving Tom a sharp look.

Tom freezes, as he had been about to interrupt the brunette, but then sighs, gesturing for her to continue, getting a smirk in silent reply.

"I'm a succubus, a 'demon' that feeds on sex and lust, as the legends likely go, though just like you humans, not all of us are 'good or evil'. Nearly a millennia ago, i was attacked while minding my own business, and trapped in that book. Over the centuries i've been found and used by my masters, as the book was designed - each one, if they progressed enough or such, adding their own additions to said book. You Master, are the most recent in owners of your very own Succubus~" The 'demon' finished, looking amused at the pole-axed expression that Tom was showing, as the whole story sounded so ludicrous that it would be impossible to state it with that calm yet alluring tone she had delivered it in the whole time she'd spoke.

"Wh-wha-what exactly does this mean?" Tom stutters out, finally getting enough control of himself to get the most pertinent, in his mind, question answered.

"Well, simply put, as long as you feed me, or allow me to find a way to feed, it all depends on what you want - and if you're willing to pay the price." The woman answers, looking pleased that Tom seemed to be smart enough to ask questions instead of panicking as some would likely do.

"What?" Tom asked, confused at the phrasing of that answer, and not sure if he'd like what her response could possibly entail.

"Simply put, while you are my Master, you only have a nominal amount of control over me and my powers, as in i cannot harm, affect, or influence you in a fatal way. In other words, i cant kill you with my powers or at all really, but i also could just walk out and go on a crazed feeding frenzy. However, you could negotiate me helping you, or doing favors for you using my natural gifts," The 'Demon' replies, rolling her eyes at the momentary scared look crossing Tom's face when she bluntly mentions killing him before it sinks in that she couldn't directly cause it.

"Okay then...what should i call you then?" Tom asks absently, not sure what to make of his bizarre night, as this was not what he expected when he was attempting to broaden his horizons spontaneously.

Chuckling, the woman locks her pinkish eyes with Tom's own, her voice taking on a seductive tone while answering, "You can call me Lilith~"

1322.content:
You think a little longer and decide it's probably best to organise some ground rules quickly if you're going to be keeping this book.

"Ok I think we can work something out. I give you permission to leave my side to feed however you on whoever you want on the following conditions. You teach me a way to summon you back to my side whenever I need you. You do not directly affect me without my consent. Lastly, do not reveal yourself to the public. One or two people here and there sounding crazy is fine but nothing that reveals you to rest of the world." You rethink your terms but everything sounds right in your head.

Thelsea pauses for a moment and looks you in the eyes. "Those are the only conditions?"

"Yes. I may introduce more later but I don't want to feel like a slave owner. I prefer to have allies."

"As long as I'm bound to that book I'll always be some form of slave. But I accept your conditions."

You shake her hand to seal the deal. Her skin is unnaturally soft, you can only imagine her hand wrapped around your-

"Ahem? The way to summon me? She breaks you out of your day dream.

"Oh, sorry.. I'm listening."

She picks up the book and passess it to you. "Place your hand on the cover and say my name. I'll come straight to you wherever you are."

And with that, she unfurls her bat like wings and flies off quickly before you can say anything else.
1322.title: Make a deal with the devil. Whenver she wants b...

choices: Take Jennifer home and get yourself familiar
Offer the man a better workout idea
13222.content:
Your cute neighbor Jenifer is standing outside with some mail. She is an athletic looking girl with blonde hair and blue eyes. She has a well defined figure with C-cup breasts but an incredible backside. She's wearing a blue tank top and yoga pants. She smiles shyly when she sees you.

Jennifer lives across from you in your apartment. She's doing her regular evening jog to maintain her athletic look. Her C-cup breasts are contained within a boring, plain black sports bra with just a hint of cleavage. Her workout shorts show off her incredibly defined backside as she runs. Guys check her out as she runs but she has learned to not pay any attention. Stopping at the traffic lights to catch her breath she gasps as she feels a sudden flush of heat as an invisible force pushes against her and then into her.

"Oh you'll do nicely" a seductive voice murmurs inside Jennifers head.

Looking behind her, Jennifer can only see a handsome man on his way to the gym.

"Let's have some fun" Unbidden, Jennifer stretches her arms above her head and lets out a sexy moan causing the man beside her to fidget.

"What the hell?!" Panicking, Jennifer trys to get herself to move away but finds herself completely helpless to the whims of this new voice. To her shock she realises that she didn't say anything outloud.

"Call me Thelsea. You and I are going to have some fun tonight"
13222.title: Thelsea feeds

info.brief_description: The innocent book Tom bought at a book sale, may not be so innocent after all.
info.description:
When buying an arcane looking book at a book sale, Tom unintentionally unleashes a succubus bound to him. Or so he assumes. However life with a succubus is not all he dreams it to be. Constant feeding of lust is required to satiate a succubus's appetite. Undesirable outcomes may occur if your succubus is left to grow hungry for too long.

Tom lives by himself in a city apartment. The nightlife of the city is vibrant with many colorful people travelling from all over the world. Working as a receptionist for a legal firm also exposes him to many interesting people, however limits his capacity to travel somewhat.

In an attempt to broaden his mind he explores a local book sale and stumbles across an arcane book. In opening it, he as inadvertently unleashed a succubus into his life. When released into the world, succubi are bound by contract to the one who release them from the book. There may be a way to re-seal a succubus into their book however none will willingly tell you.

Succubus Contract


When released from their respective books, a succubus is immediately entered into a soul binding contract with the one who freed them. The rules of the contract are as follows;
- A succubus can never deliberately kill, or otherwise place their contract, their family or their friends in harms way
- A succubus is never able to deliberately reveal their true nature to another human without prior approval from their contract
- A succubus is not required to have sex with their contract, however there will be an enhanced attraction to their contract
- A succubus who is asked to perform a reasonable favor for their contract, within their abilities, will be adequately compensated with lust as payment. If a succubus's contract does not adhere to the payment of lust, a succubus is able to use their abilities to take it from them

Succubi

Lilith:
A generally playful, flirty and overall harmless succubus, content with feeding in accordance with what Tom allows. If left too long however, she is prone to take matters into her own hands until her hunger is satiated.

Mezelin:
A more assertive and mischievous succubus who occasionally listens to what Tom wants, however will often do what she feels is right to get Tom out of his shell, whatever way she sees fit. Hunger tends to make her feel abandoned and leads to minor, vengeful actions.

Thelsea:
A succubus who is not at all happy at her current circumstances. Will only obey Tom when need be due to the contract signed upon releasing her. Any opportunity Thelsea will wreak havoc in Tom's life regardless of how frequently she feeds. Best not to let her go hungry.

Succubus Powers


- Possession (victim awareness of the actions they take while possessed is determined by the possessor)
- Mind Control (victim is unaware of the actions they are made to take)
- Body Control (victim is very aware of the actions they are made to take yet unable to stop them, unless via magical intervention)
- Lust Control (victim is made to be very aroused, either towards specific target or simply in general)
- Flight (succubi with wings have the ability to fly, however are unable to outside of the city unless permission is given by their contract)
- Disguise/ Invisibility (succubi elicit alarm from humans, to blend in succubi may go invisible, or alter their form to be less demonic)

Succubus Hunger

Succubi are constantly hungry so please consider this when writing chapters. Most succubi begin to feel the effects of hunger 3 days without feeding on lust, progressively getting more intense until 10 days without lust. Once the 10 day mark has been reached, a succubus must feed immediately or die.

The nature of a succubus's lust is complex, the same way lust is earned one day may not satiate a succubus's lust the following. Novel and spontaneous sexual encounters are safest for reliably feeding a succubus.

Please have a clock at the top left of the page indicating how long it has been since the succubus has fed.

Don't be afraid to add, however please try to follow the established personalities of the succubi, unless there is narrative sense for this to change.
Please keep all sexual participants equal to or above the age of 18.
Go nuts, have fun!
